summary: When part of Oklahoma Territory becomes officially part of the U.S., Vance Cordrell is forced to deal with some of the most infamous outlaws of the Old West.
cast: Randolph Scott|Robert Ryan|Anne Jeffreys|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Jacqueline White|Steve Brodie|Tom Keene|Robert Bray|Lex Barker|Walter Reed|Michael Harvey|Dean White|Robert Armstrong|Tom Tyler|Lew Harvey|Gary Gray|Walter Baldwin|Minna Gombell|Warren Jackson|Robert Clarke|Jason Robards Sr.|Ernie Adams|Victor Adamson|Carl Andre|Polly Bailey|Brandon Beach|Hank Bell|Eddie Borden|Chet Brandenburg|Bob Burrows|Albert Cavens|Lane Chandler|Russell Custer|Dick Dickinson|Tex Driscoll|Dan Foster|John Hamilton|Chick Hannan|Carol Henry|Earle Hodgins|Dick Johnstone|Donald Kerr|Kenneth MacDonald|Charles McAvoy|Howard McCrorey|Larry McGrath|Robert Milasch|Ida Moore|Sol Murgi|Richard Neill|Georgie Nokes|Frank O'Connor|Bud Osborne|'Snub' Pollard|Ronnie Ralph|Jean Ransome|Cyril Ring|Robert Robinson|Rudolph Salinger|Phil Schumacher|Harry Shannon|Charles Stevens|Forrest Taylor|Harry Tenbrook|Tex Terry|Richard Thorne|Dorothy Vernon|Sailor Vincent
keywords: shot in the back|indian henchman|lawmen and outlaws|cherokee indian|not a sequel
title: El regreso del forajido
